TextView.android:text: 20 Pull Ups
x3 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
15 Pull Ups
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold ---> 15 Straight Bar Dips ---> 15 Dips
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
12 Pike Push Ups ---> 12 Diamond Push Ups ---> 10 Russian Push Ups
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max L-Sit Hold
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
90 seconds DeadHang Hold
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10x 75kg Squats ---> 15x 20kg Squats
x3-4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 40kg Lunges (E/S) ---> 15x 20kg Lunges (E/S)
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 40kg One-Legged calf Raises ---> Max 20kg One-Legged Calf Raises
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Squats
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
Optional: Max Clapping Push Ups ---> 15 Diamonds (6 Sets, 2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Optional: 30 Sit Ups ---> 30 Roman Twists ---> 90 seconds Plank with 10kg (3 Sets, 2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 10kg Pull Ups + 5.5.5. Isometric Hold ---> 5 Close Grip Pull Ups + 5.5.5. Isometric Hold
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 10kg Chin Ups + 5.5.5. Isometric Hold ---> 5 Close Grip Chin Ups + 5.5.5. Isometric Hold
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 10kg Dips ---> 10x 10kg Wide Push Ups ---> 10 Russian Push Ups
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max L-Sit Hold
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
12 Bar Leg Raises ---> 2 mins Side Plank (E/S)
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
20x 50kg Squats ---> 10x 40kg Lunges (E/S)
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 30kg Bulgarian Split Squats (E/S) ---> 25 Bulgarian Split Squats (E/S)
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 min Wall Sit with 20kg ---> 1 min Wall Sit
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
30 Jumping Squats ---> 30 Jumping Lunges (E/S)
x3 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Beginner Program Level 5 - Week 5
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
Although it's recommended to repeat this routine twice, you can now progress onto the Intermediate Level Program.
CONGRATULATIONS ON COMPLETING THE BEGINNER PROGRAM!
